aboutPage.who_we_are_text: Welcome to ADC Training Center üåø‚ú®. Our goal is to provide participants with up-to-date accounting knowledge relevant to today's professional standards.
for_whom_list: Beginners with no prior accounting knowledge.
Those who wish to improve their professional accounting skills.
Organizations seeking to train their employees to meet modern requirements.
Managers and entrepreneurs who want to handle their own accounting.
üéØ Our mission is to help you acquire one of the most in-demand professions today.

faq.question: What courses do you offer?
answer: Financial Accounting
Tax Law
Accounting Software (HTS 7)

faq.question: Who can join your courses?
answer: Beginners, working accountants, and companies that want to upskill their employees.

faq.question: Do you provide a certificate?
answer: Yes, participants receive a certificate after completing the course.

aboutPage.who_we_are_text: Welcome to ADC Training Center. üåø‚ú® Our goal is to provide participants with up-to-date knowledge in the accounting field. The courses are designed for both beginners and practicing accountants. The course also introduces participants to Armenia's leading and most in-demand 1C Accounting 7 software.
target_list: Those who have no prior knowledge in accounting and want to acquire an accounting profession
Those who want to improve their accounting knowledge and skills for practical work
Organizations wishing their employees to gain modern knowledge and become more professional
Management personnel or individual entrepreneurs who want to manage accounting independently
Our goal is to help you acquire one of the most in-demand and high-paying professions today

faq.question: What courses do you offer?
answer: Financial Accounting
Tax and Labor Legislation
Electronic system for report submission and issuing accounting documents
1C Accounting 7 software

faq.question: Who can participate in the courses?
answer: Those who have no prior knowledge in accounting and want to acquire an accounting profession
Those who want to improve their accounting knowledge and skills for practical work
Organizations wishing their employees to gain modern knowledge and become more professional
Management personnel or individual entrepreneurs who want to manage accounting independently

faq.question: Where are the courses conducted?
answer: Courses are conducted at Davit Anhaght 11/6, Gegharkunik region, Vardenik village, Armenia
Online via Zoom / Google Meet / MS Teams
Hybrid format depending on participants' preference

faq.question: Is a certificate awarded after completion?
answer: Participants who successfully complete the course receive a certificate. Outstanding students get the opportunity to work in partner organizations.

faq.question: What is the duration of the courses?
answer: The total course duration is 5 months, 40 classes.
Courses are held twice a week for 2.5 hours each session.
We also have day and evening groups:
Day group: 13:30 - 16:00
Evening group: 18:00 - 20:30

faq.question: How can I register?
answer: Contact us by phone or email
Visit our office
Online via our website or Facebook/Instagram pages

faq.question: Are intensive courses available?
answer: Yes! We regularly organize intensive seminars lasting 1-2 weeks for participants with limited time.

faq.question: Who are the instructors?
answer: Our instructors are experienced professionals ‚Äî certified accountants, tax consultants, and financial analysts.

faq.question: Do the courses include practical work and internship opportunities?
answer: Yes! Our courses include many practical examples, real document work, and accounting software usage. Outstanding students may join free internships in partner organizations.
